title: Diversity in World War 2

Additional info:

I'm aware that there are several articles critiquing Dunkirk more heavily for its cast and other stuff but non of them are featured in Brooks' video. Although I might disagree with some of those articles, what they have to say is still 100 times more interesting than anything NoDumbass has to say.
